restaurants.name: Koba Cafe
restaurants.caption2: Shrimp summer rolls (Note: peanut sauce is NOT gf)
restaurants.review: Koba's Cafe is not a dedicated gf eatery, but they have some pretty reliable options. When they first opened, I had a chance to speak to the owner, Novi, who asked me to call back the next day. He had gone out of his way to check for gluten in all the ingredients for the pho, summer rolls, and the vermicelli plate. These items are all gluten-free, but be aware that the sauces that come separately on the side may not be. The siracha is gf, but the hoison is not. We feel that the pho is a safe bet, as it is naturally gf. We've had the pho with the steak, brisket, chicken, and shrimp with no problems, but be aware that the meatballs may not be safe. Also, I think it would be wise to talk to the staff each time you order the vermicelli plate to be sure no sauces containing soy sauce are used on the meat you choose.

restaurants.name: Original Pizza Place
restaurants.caption2: Caprese salad mixed with cucumber tomato salad
restaurants.review: Original Pizza Place is one of the gems of the MOV for gluten-free eating. They have a separate gf prep area with designated utensils, use fresh toppings from the back, and cook the pizza in a designated spot in the oven, using a pizza stone designated for gf only. The two gf crusts they offer are called gluten-free and cauliflower crust, and they can accomodate dairy free as well. Their salads are gf and they even have gf sorbet for dessert. (The gelato is not gf). Please be aware, though, that their sausage is not gf (ask about all toppings) and they only have special prep and cook areas at the Marietta, OH location, not the location in the mall in Vienna, WV.

restaurants.name: River Town Prime Steakhouse and Grill
restaurants.review: GF items are marked on a special menu (ask for this menu). The chef has seemed reasonably knowledgable about gluten. Make sure to double-check with them about the specific order you want. Some things can be made special to avoid gluten. I've had the prime rib (yay, prime rib!), salad, and baked potato, which are already gf. The crab dip appetizer is gf with cauliflower flatbread, but is fried in a shared fryer, which makes them not gf anymore. They were happy to warm my flatbread without using the fryer, and it was delicious!
restaurants.caption1: Prime rib with loaded baked potato
restaurants.caption2: Crab dip with cauliflower flatbread appetizer

restaurants.name: Austyn's
restaurants.review: After hearing Austyn's is one of the best fine-dining establishments in the area, we went in with high hopes. We were also excited to see menu items labeled 'gluten-free'. After eyeing a dish labeled gf on the menu, our hopes were greatly disappointed when the server informed us that the labels were not accurate. She said someone got overly-excited with the gluten-free labels and put them on many dishes that are not, in fact, gf, and she didn't know which items were actually gf. What followed was a frustrating attempt to find something safe to eat, with the server making several trips back and forth to the kitchen to ask questions, us feeling like we were inconveniencing the server, and in the end, we just left without eating anything. One of the worst experiences I've ever had in any restaurant.
restaurants.caption1: Unfortunately, since we were unable to eat anything at Austyns, we don't have any photos of the food.

messages.message: I tried the new pumpkin spice donuts by Katz and they are delicious! Found them at the Mother Earth store in Parkersburg, but I think you can order them online too, for anyone who was curious.
Jeremiah's Coffeehouse will be open late with gf food for the Sternwheel Festival in Marietta!
I just wanted to share that the salads at Blennerhasset Island appear to be gf. I didn't get sick when I ate one yesterday.
Hey everyone, Freschetta Pizza is doing BOGO on their gf pizzas this week!
Chick-Fil-A in Vienna just reopened after their remodel!
I found the gf chocolate-striped cookies by Schar at the Kroger in Athens, OH today.

comments.comment: I like to mix their caprese and cucumber tomato salads together
Their strawberry sorbet is really good!
Thanks for the reminder to watch the sauces. I almost used the hoison and then I remembered.
I think many drinks are gf, just ask them. I loved the iced peach white tea.
Some apps can be made gf, just ask them.
Finally, a place with gf burger buns!
Got very sick here. Don't risk it!
The wait staff seemed very confused about what ingredients are in the food. It didn't inspire confidence.
I've heard their food is really good from non-gf friends. Too bad we can't eat there!
